actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 in order to prohibit discrimination on the basis of physical or mental handicap in federally assisted programs.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Civil Rights Act of 1964, discrimination on the basis of a physical or mental handicap in any federally assisted program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1964 in order to prohibit discrimination on the basis of physical or mental handicap in federally assisted programs.
